description: A thief and crest sorceress, she spends her time with Mirabelle and Jerusha stealing from the rich and treasure hunting. To her chagrin, they frequently run into Sheyenne`s group and as a result, often lose the treasure. So much so that both Loretta and Mirabelle dubbed Sheyenne as the "God of Poverty" and resolved to run away the next time they see him.
name: Loretta Oratorio
